00020 #ifndef _BOARD_H_
00021 #define _BOARD_H_
00022 
00023 /* This is the processor pinout and what is connected to each pin 
00024  * =====================================================================================
00025  * 
00026  * JP2 header pinout (ISP header)
00027  * =====================================================================================
00028  * This header can be used either to program the device (pin compatible with AVR ISP)
00029  * or you can use it to communicate with other hardware devices via SPI. I would suggest
00030  * that you use PB4 in that case as the chip select pin.
00031  *
00032  *  -----
00033  * o|1 2|
00034  *  |3 4|
00035  *  |5 6|
00036  *  -----
00037  *
00038  *  Pin 1 = SPI MISO
00039  *  Pin 2 = NC
00040  *  Pin 3 = SPI SCK
00041  *  Pin 4 = SPI MOSI
00042  *  Pin 5 = uC RESET
00043  *  Pin 6 = GND
00044  * =====================================================================================
00045  *
00046  * 
00047  * PORTA
00048  * =====================================================================================
00049  * PA0 - Input  - Forward power voltage level (A/D)
00050  * PA1 - Input  - Reflected power voltage level (A/D)
00051  * PA2 - Output - NC
00052  * PA3 - Output - NC
00053  * PA4 - Output - NC
00054  * PA5 - Output - NC
00055  * PA6 - Output - NC
00056  * PA7 - Output - NC
00057  * =====================================================================================
00058  *
00059  *
00060  * PORTB
00061  * =====================================================================================
00062  * PB0 - Output - NC
00063  * PB1 - Output - NC
00064  * PB2 - Output - NC
00065  * PB3 - Output - NC
00066  * PB4 - Output - NC
00067  * PB5 - Input  - MOSI (ISP)
00068  * PB6 - Input  - MISO(ISP)
00069  * PB7 - Input  - SCK (ISP)
00070  * =====================================================================================
00071  *
00072  *
00073  * PORTC
00074  * =====================================================================================
00075  * PC0 - Output - NC
00076  * PC1 - Output - NC
00077  * PC2 - Input  - External address BIT0
00078  * PC3 - Input  - External address BIT1
00079  * PC4 - Input  - External address BIT2
00080  * PC5 - Input  - External address BIT3
00081  * PC6 - Input  - 32.768kHz clock
00082  * PC7 - Input  - 32.768kHz clock
00083  * =====================================================================================
00084  *
00085  *
00086  * PORTD
00087  * =====================================================================================
00088  * PD0 - Input  - BUS RXD (USART)
00089  * PD1 - Output - BUS TXD (USART)
00090  * PD2 - Output - NC
00091  * PD3 - Input  - Configuration bit 0
00092  * PD4 - Input  - Configuration bit 1
00093  * PD5 - Input  - Configuration bit 2
00094  * PD6 - Input  - Freq div output (freq counter input, ICP)
00095  * PD7 - Output - Counter clear (freq counter)
00096  * =====================================================================================
00097  */
00098 
00099 
00100 #endif
